## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-bugfix-v8-spread-parameters-in-optional-chaining
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-bugfix-v8-spread-parameters-in-optional-chaining --dev
```
